title: Rainy night driving in a city with moderate traffic.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy night in a city with moderate traffic.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.2 m/s). There are 12 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy night in a city with moderate traffic. The road is wet and visibility is reduced. There are several other cars on the road, some of which are also driving slowly. The traffic lights are visible in the distance and are displaying green and red lights. The rain is falling heavily and the windshield wipers are in use.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy night in a city with moderate traffic. The driver is being cautious due to the wet road conditions and reduced visibility. The ego vehicle is maintaining a safe distance from the other cars on the road and is prepared to brake or change lanes if necessary. The driver is paying close attention to the traffic lights and is following the rules of the road. The rain is causing some difficulty in seeing the road ahead, but the driver is using the windshield wipers to help clear the glass. Overall, the driver is prioritizing safety and is adapting to the challenging weather conditions.
